hero.title: Paul Viandier
hero.subtitle: Web Developer & Cybersecurity Enthusiast
hero.description: Paul Viandier, web developer passionate about cybersecurity. 20 years old, passionate about IT, cybersecurity and development.

about.title: About me
about.content: I am Paul Viandier, a web developer passionate about cybersecurity. Currently training as a web integrator on a work-study program, I am acquiring a solid foundation in development and integration. My goal is to continue with training as a full-stack web developer in order to broaden my skills, understand the entire production chain of a web project, and be able to manage both the frontend and backend. As a web developer, I specialize in creating modern web applications with TypeScript, React and Next.js. My portfolio showcases my projects and web development skills.

descriptions.API REST: Architecture for creating interoperable web services
descriptions.Git: Distributed version control system for managing source code
descriptions.GitHub: Hosting and collaboration platform for development projects
descriptions.EmailJS: Service for sending emails directly from the frontend
descriptions.Cybersecurity: Practices and technologies for protecting computer systems
descriptions.SEO: Search engine optimization to improve visibility

meta.title: Games & Challenges
meta.description: Test your web development knowledge with our interactive quizzes and discover my GitHub statistics.

hero.title: Games & Challenges
hero.description: Test your knowledge in web development, cybersecurity, and modern technologies through our interactive quizzes. Also discover my GitHub statistics and development activity.

descriptions.easy: Test your basic knowledge in web development, frontend and backend technologies, and cybersecurity. This quiz is perfect for beginners or reviewing fundamentals.
descriptions.medium: Challenge yourself with deeper questions on advanced concepts, development best practices, and security aspects. Ideal for experienced developers.
descriptions.hard: Put your skills to the test with expert questions on architecture, complex algorithms, advanced cybersecurity, and optimizations. For true experts!
